name: SEO Nofollow
author: Sven Rochel

sections.description:
Automatically add rel=”nofollow” to links that point to a domain added to the list. This is an ultra light weight plugin. Whatever affiliate program you are using just add the domain to the list and the Plugin will do the rest. For instance add amazon.com, amzn.to, affili.net and booking.com to the domain list and all links to these websites will be marked as nofollow.Key Benefits

  • Ultra light weight plugin
  • Auto nofollow specified domains
  • Best for affiliate links or sponsored posts

Support

Send me an email: hello@svenrochel.com
sections.installation:
Adding SEO Nofollow+ to your WordPress site is really easy:

  • Extract seo-nofollow.zip
  • Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
  • Go to Setting -> SEO Nofollow
  • Add domains and save
  • Done!
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • This is the initial release of the plugin!
